org.openadaptor.auxil.simplerecord
Interface ISimpleRecordAccessor

All Known Implementing Classes:
Dom4jSimpleRecordAccessor, JSONObjectSimpleRecordAccessor, StringSimpleRecordAccessor
public interface ISimpleRecordAccessor

General Interface for helper (facade) classes which provide access to (Object) Records, as ISimpleRecord implementations.

Author:
Eddy Higgins

Method Summary
 ISimpleRecord asSimpleRecord(java.lang.Object record)
          Generate an ISimpleRecord representation of the supplied record Object.
 java.lang.Class getUnderlyingType()
          Return the type of the record being presented as an ISimpleRecord.
 

Method Detail

asSimpleRecord

public ISimpleRecord asSimpleRecord(java.lang.Object record)
                             throws RecordException
Generate an ISimpleRecord representation of the supplied record Object.

Note: To get back the underlying Record object, use ISimpleRecord.getRecord()

Parameters:
record - the object to be accessed as an ISimpleRecord
Returns:
a view of the record as an ISimpleRecord.
Throws:
RecordException - if the supplied record cannot be viewed as an ISimpleRecord

getUnderlyingType

public java.lang.Class getUnderlyingType()
Return the type of the record being presented as an ISimpleRecord.

Returns:
Class
